DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trials Cooperative Group Registering Institution Identifier Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Enter the unique CTEP institution code where the patient was originally registered on study (e.g., institution where the patient signed the Informed Consent). For patients registered at a CCOP institution, provide either the CCOP main member institution code or the CCOP component institution code (preferred).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trials Cooperative Group Registering Institution Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify or name an established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research, where patients are registering or recording officially into the treatment study.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Clinical Trials Cooperative Group Registering Institution
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A group of physicians, hospitals, or both formed to treat a large number of persons in the same way so that a new treatment can be evaluated quickly. Clinical trials of new cancer treatments often require many more people than a single physician or hospital can care for.:Registering; the act of listing or recording officially.:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research as, a literary institution; also, a building or the buildings occupied or used by such organization.

Concepts.definition: A group of researchers, cancer centers, and community doctors who provide infrastructure for studies of new cancer treatment, prevention, early detection, quality of life, and rehabilitation. (BRIDG)
Registering; the act of listing or recording officially.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.

Property.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Value Domain for Regression testing DO NOT EDIT
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the code that uniquely identifies an institution.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Source
ReferenceDocuments.description: Data element and all values comply with Clinical Data Update System (CDUS) v3.0 Release 2.
